itunes:title: Aug 30, 2022 - Washington Post Struggling, May Cut 100 Newsroom Positions
title: Aug 30, 2022 - Washington Post Struggling, May Cut 100 Newsroom Positions
description:
Jeff Bezos is moving on as the Washington Post struggles to keep its head above water; they may have to cut 100 newsroom positions in a massive downsize - meanwhile, conservative news outlets are expanding. A new poll shows the majority of U.S. voters believe the new IRS agents will be deployed to target low and middle income Americans - Poso provides more insight as to who will be targeted. Twitter almost monetized child porn while attempting to rival OnlyFans with plans to monetize adult content - Jack questions how Twitter is still in business with how much child exploitation is on their platform. A National Bureau of Economic Research report reveals that millennials are the poorest generation since the 2007 Great Recession - guess it’s hard to bounce back when the government undermines its people’s freedom and success. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to patriotmobile.com/poso/ or call 972-PATRIOT to get free activation with offer code POSO


Try Scoremaster for free by going to www.scoremaster.com/poso and use code POSO

Jeff Bezos is moving on as the Washington Post struggles to keep its head above water; they may have to cut 100 newsroom positions in a massive downsize - meanwhile, conservative news outlets are expanding.
